thread.title: Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,990
thread.title_full: Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,990

title: Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,990
text:
Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs... Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,990 By March 24, 2017 “The Admire Swadesh is a budget 4G-enabled offering with dual WhatsApp feature” 
Zen Mobile recently launched the Cinemax 4G budget 4G and VoLTE-enabled smartphone. Today, the company has added yet another such offering to its portfolio with the launch of the Admire Swadesh. The phone comes with support for 22 languages and lets you set up two WhatsApp accounts on the same device. 
As for the other specs, the Zen Mobile Admire Swadesh features a 5-inch display of unknown resolution. The phone is powered by a 1.3GHz quad-core processor, mated to 1GB of RAM. It comes with 8GB of internal memory, further expandable up to 32GB. Its other specs include a 5-megapixel autofocus rear snapper, a 2-megapixel front shooter, 4G LTE, VoLTE, dual-SIM slots, Android Marshmallow and a 2,000mAh battery. 
The Admire Swadesh has been priced at Rs 4,990, and will be available via major brick and mortar stores across the country. The phone comes bundled with a free screen guard and a six-month screen replacement warranty. Facebook Comments
